thread.title: Fire at Hull Prison
thread.title_full: Fire at Hull Prison | Calendar - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Fire at Hull Prison
text:
Credit: ITV News Four fire engines have been involved in dealing with a fire at Hull Prison tonight.
Humberside Fire and Rescue Services were alerted to the blaze at 6.58pm. Four appliances were dispatched and the fire is now "under control".
Three fire engines remain at the building on Hedon Road.
"HMP Hull staff put out a small fire on 21 February. There were no injuries to staff or prisoners.”
– Prison Service spokesperson Hull East Yorkshire
